nodes.bodyText: Please follow the existing order of ascending ids, otherwise someone who adds a new research at the bottom will miss this ONE single misplaced research inbetween with a much higher id.
If I were in you I'd've put this to the last line and give it the next id. So no other researches' ids would be changed and anyone who adds a research later will know what's taken and what is not.
That's what I meant, this should go at the bottom so it's back in order.
4 Nether stars is quite expensive for something that can be substituted with 8 carbonado capacitors.

Well I think carbonado is more expensive and grindy. But since all the other recipes required 4 pf the previous tier. Maybe make the recipe 4 carb capacitor and perhaps 2 nether stars(instead of redstones)
So carbonado instead of stars and stars instead of redstone?
Check the new commit. Good enough?
